sentence.Network_en: An aircraft gaining speed during take - off is evidently not an inertial system.
sentence.Network_cn: 一架正在加速起飞的飞机,显然不是惯性系统.

sentence.Network_en: A blackbody radiator will therefore appear black in all inertial frames.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个辐射黑体在一切惯性系中都呈现黑色.

sentence.Network_en: In undisturbed inertial motion, the angular momentum is constant.
sentence.Network_cn: 在无扰动惯性运动中, 角动量是恒定的.
